radiographic_examinations.findings: Left atrial mass (4.0 x 3.7 cm) attached to the atrial septum.
Left atrial mass (3.8 x 3.9 x 4.3 cm) with numerous calcifications, nearly obstructing the inflow of the right pulmonary veins.
Large and hard mass between the right superior and inferior pulmonary veins, involving the posterior and superior left atrial walls, atrial septum, and right atrial wall.
No significant change in the size of the fibroma; broad base attachment to the superior limbus of the atrial septum, independent motion noted.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: No significant change in the fibroma size.
